md

Class CRDWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • md.CRDWriter

  • public class CRDWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Prints/writes the information of the system in PDB format.
    Since:
    Sindo 3.7
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kiyoshi Yagi

      • isIOextend

        public boolean isIOextend()
        Returns the value of IOextend
        Returns:
        true if extended format is on.

      • setIoextend

        public void setIoextend(boolean ioextend)
        Sets the value of IOextend
        Parameters:
        ioextend - true/false to switch the extended format on/off

      • print

        public void print(java.lang.String segname,
                  Residue[] residues)
        Print the information to the console
        Parameters:
        segname - Segment name
        residues - The residues to be printed

      • print

        public void print(Segment segment)
        Print the information to the console
        Parameters:
        segment - The segments to be printed

      • print

        public void print(SystemMD system)
        Print the information to the console

      • write

        public void write(java.lang.String fileName,
                  Segment segment)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the information to a file
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of a file
        segment - The segment to be written
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when I/O error occurred or segment has illegal block

      • write

        public void write(java.lang.String fileName,
                  SystemMD system)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the information to a file. Note that the coordinates of a current frame is written.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of a file
        system - The system to be written
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when I/O error occurred
